title: This is your chance to rent a fully restored 3 story townhome
description: This is your chance to rent a fully restored 3 story townhome on prestigious Delancey Street. 128 Delancey Street is located on a tree lined historical cobblestone street, and allows the resident all the charm that Society Hill has to offer. Enter through the front door to an open concept floor plan that is filled with natural light and stunning hardwood flooring throughout. The living room boasts a gas fireplace, with a stunning built-ins surround. The dining room is located in the heart of the home and has a large window that overlooks the garden.. The kitchen is spacious and boasts custom cabinets, quartz countertops, a classic basket weave marble backsplash, and a GE Cafe stainless steel slide in gas range, french door stainless steel fridge and a stainless steel dishwasher. Enjoy dining in the kitchen's breakfast area while overlooking the stunning view of the landscaped back patio though over sided, southern facing windows. The perfect entertainers space. Showcasing evergreens, annuals and perennials. With raised brick beds and flagstone pavers. On the second level you will find 2 spacious bedrooms, and two other gas burning fireplaces, with period woodwork and a bonus room that could serve as a nursery, office, or dressing room. The full bathroom has a double vanity, gray subway tile backsplash, chrome fixtures, and quartz countertops. The 3rd level offers a large 3rd bedroom with a half bathroom. This home has been fully renovated. All new windows, electric, HVAC, washer and dryer, wireless smoke and CO detectors, smart alarm system, and many other modern updates. Steps away from all of local Society Hill restaurants, Spruce Harbor Park, Head house square, charming boutiques, grocery stores, old city, Washington Square and is minutes to all the major arteries of 95 and 76, and the bridges, which makes commuting a breeze. However, once you are home. The walk ability score here is 100%. You will never need to use your car. Do not miss the chance to live in this historic home in the heart of THRIVING Society Hill! Schedule your tour today!

description: Welcome home to this twin home in the heart of Conshohocken Borough, which is located on a quiet street in the upper avenues. The living room opens into the bright formal dining area which leads right into the kitchen. The kitchen is completely updated with granite countertops, brand new white cabinetry, high end stainless steel appliances, and plenty of storage. The kitchen also serves to be spacious enough for a breakfast table. Through the kitchen is the conveniently located updated laundry room/mudroom and also attached is a completely updated full bathroom with a vaulted cedar ceiling. Off the rear of the home is a back deck/patio with two tiers. Freshly painted! There is a wood fence in the backyard that continues to the side yard. Feel free to plant your very own garden with the best area for sunshine. This backyard is the perfect place for that morning cup of coffee or evening glass of wine by the fire with some of the best views that Conshohocken has to offer. Finally you will see this home is located on the corner lot which always provides ample parking on Jones! The location of this home cannot be beat. Within walking distance to parks, coffee shops, all of the restaurants and nightlife that Conshohocken has to offer, as well as the Spring Mill Septa Station for a short ride into the city! description: For rent in desirable Lindenfeild neighborhood, is this polished and updated 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath townhome located on a cul de sac lane. The home is practically next door to North Branch Park and Chestnut Street Park! There are walking trails and 3 playgrounds to get that breathe of fresh air every day. The home boasts a bright kitchen with granite countertops, elegant tile backsplash, smart lighting, recessed lights, stainless steel appliances, and direct access to the large deck. The kitchen is open to the dining room area which flows nicely into the living room. All luxury vinal planking flooring on the first floor and neutral paint. A powder room bathroom completes this floor. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms a bathroom and access to the attic for additional storage space. Each bedroom has a ceiling fan, large closets, recessed lights and beautiful hardwood floors. The main bedroom has 3 large closets. The bathroom is a jack-n-jill style with access from the hallway or the main bedroom. The full bathroom has double sinks, tiled tub/shower surround, curved shower rod, large shower head and ceramic flooring. Here you’ll find the easy access to the washer and dryer as well. Enjoy the spring, summer and fall seasons outside on the deck with natural privacy on 2 sides and fence panels on the other. For additional storage, there’s a tall garden shed on the deck. Flower beds add to the warmth of this home at both the front and the back of the house. The HOA community takes care of the lawn and common areas as well as the snow plowing. Close to Chalfont and Doylestown stores, shops, restaurants, parks, museums and Lake Galena at Peace Valley Park. Septa’s regional rail Chalfont Station is 1 mile from this home.  Sorry, but no pets.

title: Well maintaned 2 bed 2 bath & Granite Countertops with Cabinetry
description: Welcome to this beautiful end unit condominium in the highly desired 55+ neighborhood of Gwynedd Commons in Upper Gwynedd Township. As you enter the home, it will be love at first sight. The home features 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, eat-in kitchen, a second-floor loft, a garage and new carpeting throughout.  Not to mention the 9 foot ceilings and recessed lighting. You can sell that lawn mower and leaf blower before you move in as the Gwynedd Commons association maintains the lawn, snow and seasonal clean up giving you the free time you deserve. As you enter the home you will step into the warm and cozy living room that has beautiful gas fireplace and plantation shutters. Just off the kitchen is the stunning eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, black granite countertops, 42” Cherry cabinetry, two pantries and beautiful hardwood floors.  The dining area is a good size for family dinners and entertaining with access to the well-maintained deck.  Crown molding and chair rails surround the kitchen and dining area. Just off the kitchen is the main level laundry with plenty of storage and access to the garage. Two very large bedrooms are on the first floor with 2 full bathrooms. The primary bedroom is carpeted with recessed lighting, a walk-in closet and 3-piece on-suite bathroom. The other bedroom is very roomy with carpeting and a closet.  One the second floor is a loft that is a perfect place for a hobby room, theatre space, office, or another space for guests to stay over.  The basement is full sized with ample storage space. The location of Gwynedd Commons is close to shopping, restaurants, and major arteries such as 476 and Sumneytown Pike for an easy commute.  Lansdale provides so many activities including First Fridays, farmers market, parades, and main street is lined with restaurants.  This home goes on the market on 4/13 so book your appointment to see this house soon. It will not last. SEND NUMBER FOR MORE INFORMATION
